name: getLineFragmentRect(_:usedRect:forParagraphSeparatorGlyphRange:atProposedOrigin:)
desc: Calculates the line fragment rectangle and the portion of the rectangle that contains marks.
declaration:
func getLineFragmentRect(_ lineFragmentRect: UnsafeMutablePointer<NSRect>, 
                usedRect lineFragmentUsedRect: UnsafeMutablePointer<NSRect>, 
forParagraphSeparatorGlyphRange paragraphSeparatorGlyphRange: NSRange, 
        atProposedOrigin lineOrigin: NSPoint)
